body.name: Hzuaneri Bookshelf, 5-Tier Narrow Book Shelf, with 2 Hooks, Bookcase for Home Office, Living Room, Bedroom, Kitchen, Rustic Brown and Black BC10501B

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: [Space-Saving for Any Room] This 9.5"D x 15.7"W x 63"H narrow bookshelf occupies little floor space yet offers you 5 tiers of vertical storage, making full use of the small spaces in your home office, living room, Kitchen，bedroom, balcony or entryway

[One Shelf, Many Uses] Store cooking utensils in the kitchen, display trinkets in the living room, hold photo frames in the bedroom, or organize books in the home office. Use this narrow shelf however you want!

[Sturdy & Durable] Crafted with sturdy steel and high-quality particleboard, this ladder shelf can hold up to 110 lb in total, providing strong support for your books and collections. This sturdy shelf is built to last and will serve you for years to come

[Stable and Safe] X-shaped bars reinforce the structure, adjustable feet keep this tall book shelf balanced on slightly uneven floors, and the included anti-tip kit will help you fix it to the wall for greater stability and safety
[Hassle-Free Assemble] No difficult assembly here. The numbered parts and clear instructions will help you assemble this floor-standing shelf effortlessly

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Convenient Hooks This bookcase with 2 hooks, you can use it to hang items, saving space and easy access at the same time. Anti-Tip Kit The included anti-tip kit helps you secure the 5-tier shelving unit to the wall for added stability and safety. X-Bar Reinforcement The X-shaped bars on the back enhance the overall stability of this bookshelf, so you can display your items with peace of mind.

Specifications: Color: Rustic Brown, BlackMaterial: Particleboard, SteelProduct Size: 9.5”D x 15.7W x 63”H (30 x 34 x 160 cm)Product Weight: 17 lb (7.7 kg) Package Contents: 1 x Bookshelf1 x Accessory Bag1 x Anti-Tip Kit1 x Instructions HzuaneriNotes: Children are not allowed to climb on or play with the shelf for safety reasons.Please secure this ladder shelf to the wall with the provided anti-tip kit for safe use.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great space saver.
reviews.reviewText: Great space saver for our latest plants.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to put together.
reviews.reviewText: Was exactly as described and extremely easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, sturdy, terrible sticker placement
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty nice shelf rack. I would have given it 5 stars, but the placement of stickers was infuriating. Before I get into the sticker issue, the shelf is fairly sturdy, a tiny bit wobbly, but they do include straps that can be screwed into your drywall for securing and stabilizing. Good quality wood and instructions easy to follow. Just pay close attention to where the holes are in the instructions because there is a million screws and you don't want to get it backward... The shelf looks exactly as pictured, so I did not include a photo of that but included a photo of one of the stickers. If you are like me and hate stickers that don't come off easy, then you're in for a treat with this item. To make it even worse, they tossed the photographed sticker smack dab in the middle of one of the shelves. Took me 15 minutes to scrape it off and was still left with adhesive residue on the shelf. Oh well, there could be worse things I have to deal with. Don't let this stop you from buying, just add adhesive remover to your cart as well.... 8/10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this shelf! It is the perfect height and I love all of the shelves there are to place my home decor. I also use a couple of the shelves for books. It fits right in to the corner of my living room. It was easy to assemble and looks great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdier than I expected.
reviews.reviewText: When I was putting this together I was disappointed because it seemed really flimsy. But after I finished it was much better than I had thought it would be. It's actually pretty nice. I have mine in a corner and it has a decent amount on each shelf. I'm happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Patience and power tools needed.
reviews.reviewText: As with most "needs assembly" furniture, the assembly instructions are minimalist line drawings without written directions. The drawings are adequate to assemble the Hzuaneri 6-tier narrow bookshelf but, with over 70 individual screws and fasteners, you definitely will need both patience and power tools. I found that for me anyway, it was easier to assemble the bookshelf by level (A, B, C, etc.) than assembling each frame side and then attaching the shelves. Kudos for including extra hardware (which I didn't need). All the hardware counts were exactly right. The bookshelf has adjustable feet (Part 101) which makes leveling the bookshelf very easy to do, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For $40 I can’t be mad. The quality is ok but very cheap materials and a hassle to build
